title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2701/98 of 17 December 1998 concerning the series of data to be produced for structural business statistics (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2701/98 of 17 December 1998 concerning the series of data to be produced for structural business statistics (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The frequency for the compilation of multi-yearly characteristics, the breakdowns of results and the first reference year for the compilation of the preliminary results referred to in Articles 4, 8 and 9 of Regulation (EC, Euratom) No 58/97 are specified in the series of data in the Annex to this Regulation.

1. Member States shall produce these series for the data concerning the 1999 reference year and subsequent years.
2. Member States shall also produce these series for data concerning the 1995, 1996, 1997 and 1998 reference years where this corresponds to existing national practices.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 20th day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 December 1998.
For the Commission
Yves-Thibault de SILGUY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 14, 17.1.1997, p. 1.
